scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Fair Land, Fair Land (1982), undated, series the book's manuscripts, proof, and revisions. Fair Land, Fair Land released in 1982 by Houghton Mifflin Company, was the last published book in Guthrie's six book series known as the epic of the west novels by Guthrie. It follows the character, Dick Summers, as he return travels the Oregon Trail during the mid 1800's.
